task.name: Review and check assignment
task.description: Check the assignment send by students and decide whether to approve or ask them to re-submit the assignment.

task.name: ask to resubmit the assignment
task.description: Ask students to resubmit assignment by providing necessary feedback.

task.name: mandatory assignment 01 approved
task.description: Approve mandatory assignment 01 and inform students.

task.name: qualify for written exam
task.description: Qualify students to take up written exam.
